title: YouTube Premium ad glitch resolved, ensuring $13.99 ad-free experience
desc: Offering a sigh of relief for YouTube Premium subscribers, Google has resolved a glitch that displayed a host of mid-playlist ads earlier this week, restoring the ad-free experience for which YouTube Premium users pay $13.99 a month.The...

title: France to summon US ambassador after comments about death of far-right activist
desc: Official US social media accounts posted about rise of ‘violent radical leftism’ after killing of Quentin Deranque in Lyon last week

title: Attempted murder arrests after crash near Bristol Airport led to fight
desc: Six men are in police custody following the incident on the A38 on Saturday morning.

title: St. Francis’ Remains, Rarely Seen, Go on Display in Assisi
desc: The bones of Italy’s patron saint will be shown to the public for a month, to mark the 800th anniversary of his death.

title: Golden again! U.S. tops Canada to win 1st men's hockey gold since 'Miracle on Ice'
desc: The U.S. won its first Olympic gold in 46 years in a 2-1 overtime thriller over rival Canada. A brilliant performance by U.S. goaltender Connor Hellebuyck saved the Americans' chances.

title: Nairobi-Thika Road Expressway to be launched in September, Ruto says
desc: Ruto said the 60Km highway will begin near existing Nairobi Expressway at Museum Hill Interchange

title: Cork butchers closing after 96 years with final goodbye to customers

desc: A superb bowling performance ignites England's T20 World Cup campaign as Harry Brook's side beat co-hosts Sri Lanka by 51 runs.
